TopicTitle: No game is safe from Jeb!

Articles.Content:
Normally I don't play games like GTA, but my cousin was playing it and I noticed you can make custom Emblems for "Crews" Basically clans online. The only way you can make these emblems is with a basic emblem creator, pretty much like Paint but only with shapes, Using HTML codes I managed to do this.

Me and a bunch of friends (Whom are also big KSP fans) decided to make this a Fan group on the game called "Team Jeb".

Edited January 18, 2014 by Sickle
The Logo is even on my car XD
